## Printing Integers

Print the integers from 1 to 10

### Without the use of loop

print(1)
print(2)
print(3)
print(4)
print(5)
print(6)
print(7)
print(8)
print(9)
print(10)


### With the use of loop

for (i in c(1:10)) {
  print(i)}
